fu.esi

Class IMI_ESI_ByteArray

  • java.lang.Object
    • fu.esi.IMI_ESI<byte[]>
      • fu.esi.IMI_ESI_ByteArray

  • public class IMI_ESI_ByteArray
extends IMI_ESI<byte[]>
    Encapsulates an Extended Split Index that fully resides in memory (IMI, In-Memory-Index). It allows to register byte[] (and only byte[]) that reside in their bounding rect. Later they can be looked up in an hashtable manner, i.e. the caller can query for all objects that reside in a given rectangle. In principle this list could also be built up by IMI_ESI<byte[]>, but as the byte[] content is easily to safe, this class support persistant storage. Caution: currently, only byte[] with a length up to 255 bytes are supported for persitant storage.
